name: Cracker
description:
Cracker is a single player, mouse driven Mastermind game

In this variant the computer generates a hidden sequence of four colours which the player has ten attempts to guess.
The player selects their colour by clocking on the appropriate part of the screen, the game then places it on the board in the next available position.

shot.caption: The game area before a game begins. When the player clicks on their first colour the game automatically places it in the top left position, subsequent colour selections complete that column
